Do either of these apply: 
 *    This members treatment did not previously require prior-authorization from BCBS Massachusetts or their prior insurance carrier, and benefits were received? 
 *    The services been requested, approved, and rendered for this member in the past?
This member has transitioned to BCBSMA coverage within the past six months.
The member could have reasonably relied on a previous approval to continue services and it will be detrimental to the member if continuation of the services is not approved
Interruption of the services could potentially alter the progression of the condition or disease
Continuation of the services will allow an appropriate transition of care
